name: Slapgame
body:
Designed by 
# MaLynda Poulsen
Welcome to "Hanz and Franz". This is a fun little game I started when I was first learning to code.
I created the background using Photoshop and this game has 10 different gifs. Each gif has somewhere between 4-23 images.
This game uses HTML5, CSS, and jQuery. 

I felt like this was a unique opportunity to employ some of my own interests and themes within my designs. I decided to use a creepy vintage circus theme. I found many vintage images of side show actors, banners, tents, etc. and used them in this game. 

Enjoy!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
